name: GetActorHealth
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Get the health of an actor.

params_body.name: actorid
params_body.description: The ID of the actor to get the health of.

params_body.name: &Float:health
params_body.description: A float variable, passed by reference, in to which to store the actor's health.

return_values:
1 - success

 0 - failure (i.e. actor is not created).

 NOTE: The actor's health is stored in the specified variable, not in the return value.
